items.description: This show is not a typical cop show. The Wire is a show that looks at the war on drugs and the horrific consequences of it.  It is a show about people and institutions and how they relate to each other.

items.title: TV-Shows
items.description: TV shows have been my favorite way of seeing things. They are good to work on
